squares

Class Special

  • java.lang.Object
    • squares.Square
      • squares.Special
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable

    public class Special
extends Square
implements Printable
    This is the Special Square class. A special square class defines the squares of the board that are not Properties, Train Stations or Utilities but rather have types such as TAX, INCOME, JAIL, CHANCE, COMMUNITY CHEST
    Author:
    Robert Keenan and Ciaran Nolan

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class squares.Square

    • Constructor Detail

      • Special

        public Special(java.lang.String name,
               int indexLocation,
               boolean canBuy,
               java.lang.String type,
               int value,
               Square.SquareType squareType)
        Special Square constructor takes a number of arguments
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the square such as Jail in String form
        indexLocation - The location of the square on the board as an integer
        canBuy - A boolean to determine if you are able to buy the square or not
        type - The type of the square given as a capitalised string such as TAX, GO, JAIL, FREE, CHANCE, COMMUNITY CHEST
        value - The value of the square such as a TAX
        squareType - The type of square which is defined by SquareType enum which is SquareType.SPECIAL

    • Method Detail

        Get the type of the square
        Returns:
        this.type The type of the square

        public int getValue()
        Get the value of the square

      • setType

        public void setType(java.lang.String type)
        Setting the type of the Special Square
        Parameters:
        type - A string of the type in capitals like TAX, INCOME

      • setValue

        public void setValue(int value)
        Setting the value of a square
        Parameters:
        value - A value as a positive integer

      • implementSpecialSquare

        public void implementSpecialSquare(Player player)
        This implements the special square whenever a player lands on one. It detects the square type whether it is TAX, GO, COMMUNITY CHEST, etc and implements the relevant methods for these
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is on the square

      • printInstanceData

        public void printInstanceData()
        Print the instance data using the Interface Printable

      • canBuy

        public boolean canBuy()
        Whether you can buy this Square
        Specified by:
        canBuy in interface Printable
        Returns:
        true if no owner, false if there is an owner
